scenario_text.value:
Naw, neither hide nor hair... Where’d that
damn traitor run off to?!

He was near the den, he couldn’t have gotten
that far.

(Traitor? Who could that be? No, hold on, one
of them said “den,” didn’t he?)

They’re a buncha hooligans. Always playing
pranks!

Then let’s hide here, so they don’t take
a crack at us.

I know them! Those’re the guys that took out
Piedmon!
What?! Then we gotta show them some pain!
Damn, guess it’s on... Let’s go, Agumon!
